channel.title: Runeshock Official
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/140vgd5.png[/img]
[i][b]Introduction:[/b][/i] Hello to the wonderful community of Moparscape, I would like to to tell you about myself. I've been dealing with RSPS since I was 13. I never fully became a member of the forums since 2009. I am not a fan of developing clients, but all the time I have to because I'm a solo artist. I love working on servers, and I don't really mind it, cleaning, fixing, updating, compiling, and running. Coming up with, and implementing your ideas into a project is pretty awesome. Runeshock is a project I've been working on for quite some time, in my spare time, it's my hobby and I honestly enjoy it. I think it's a project that will be amazing to you all, and most likely enjoyable by all when hosted. Why? I care about the little things, always have, and always will. I believe an interactable world is the best type of world, whether it's with Players, NPC's or objects.
[i][b]Media Images: [/b][/i] http://share.pho.to/4e3pp
[i][b]Related Threads:[/b][/i] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657933.0.html]Runeshock Resting[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657792.0.html]Runeshock Drops[/url]
[b][i]Complete:[/i][/b][i] Open Interface Stops Movement Object Name Detection NPC Name Detection NPC Clipping Player Clipping Region Clipping Path Finding Pet Handling Door Handling Ladder Handling Coffin Handling Manhole Handling Picking Cabbage Picking Potato Picking Onions Picking Wheat Picking Flax Fight Caves Duel Arena Bank Pin System Deposit Boxes[/i]
[i][b]Incomplete:[/b][/i] [i]Player Resting Nazi Zombies Castle Wars Correct NPC Animations Correct NPC Drops Jumping Gates Jumping Stiles Trapdoor Handling[/i] [/center]

item.title: Runeshock Official
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:7, topic:539322”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=658157.msg4402325#msg4402325 date=1390940862]
link me when it’s up I may not play the server as I don’t do rsps any longer but I will spa-post on your forums
[/quote]That he will.

Good luck on your development, looks promising thus far.[/quote]

Thank-you, but for now I’m taking a break since I do not have much time to proceed with this project.

Read full topic

item.title: Runeshock Official
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

[center]

Introduction:
Hello to the wonderful community of Moparscape, I would like to to tell you about myself. I’ve been dealing with RSPS since I was 13. I never fully became a member of the forums since 2009.
I am not a fan of developing clients, but all the time I have to because I’m a solo artist. I love working on servers, and I don’t really mind it, cleaning, fixing, updating, compiling, and running.
Coming up with, and implementing your ideas into a project is pretty awesome. Runeshock is a project I’ve been working on for quite some time, in my spare time,
it’s my hobby and I honestly enjoy it. I think it’s a project that will be amazing to you all, and most likely enjoyable by all when hosted.
Why? I care about the little things, always have, and always will. I believe an interactable world is the best type of world, whether it’s with Players, NPC’s or objects.

Media Images:
http://share.pho.to/4e3pp

Related Threads:
Runeshock Resting
Runeshock Drops

Complete:
Open Interface Stops Movement
Object Name Detection
NPC Name Detection
NPC Clipping
Player Clipping
Region Clipping
Path Finding
Pet Handling
Door Handling
Ladder Handling
Coffin Handling
Manhole Handling
Picking Cabbage
Picking Potato
Picking Onions
Picking Wheat
Picking Flax
Fight Caves
Duel Arena
Bank Pin System
Deposit Boxes

Incomplete:
Player Resting
Nazi Zombies
Castle Wars
Correct NPC Animations
Correct NPC Drops
Jumping Gates
Jumping Stiles
Trapdoor Handling
[/center]

Read full topic
